All Classes

Class
Description
ApplicationClass
Main Application Class for the Restaurant.
CustomerToSeatInterface
Boundary Class that facilitates seating a customer who has just arrived at the restaurant
databaseRW
This class implements methods to read and write on the database(.dat files)
ExceptionScan
Exception Scan class builds on the Scanner class to only take appropriate input from the user.
FoodItem
This class represents the Ala Carte items on the menu.It extends from Menu Items
FoodItem.FoodType
 
Member
This class defines members of the restauarant
MemberInterface
This is the interface class that allows the restaurant staff to choose whether they wan to add, remove or update members
MemberManager
Member Manager class that manages creation, removal and modifications to Members
MenuIManager
Menu item Manager class that manages creation, removal and modifications to Menu
MenuInterface
Boundary Class that facilitates actions between users and the MenuItem Objects
MenuItem
This is the fundamental class that represents the entities displayed on the menu.
Order
Order class represents a list of menu items that the customer has ordered.
OrderInterface
Boundary class that provides interface for the user to implement all the order related functionalities
OrderManager
This class deals with handling lists of following objects : order, menuItem, Table, Order, Staff
Reservation
Reservation class represents a time slot in the next 1 month during the restaurant opening hours, in which a customer has created a reservation.
ReservationInterface
This method prints the interface for the restaurant staff to choose if they want to view, create or delete reservations
ReservationManager
This class deals with managing reservations creation and deletion.
Restaurant
Restaurant class creates lists which hold and initialize important restaurant objects such as tables, staff, etc.
SalesReportInterface
This is a boundary class to generate a sales order invoice for a give time period
SetPackage
SetPackage object class contains promotional items that are sold together in a meal.
Staff
Staff class represents the employees working at the restaurant who are assigned to serve customers.
Staff.GenderType
 
Table
Table class enacts a real table where customers are seated or the tables are kept empty for reservations.
TableManager
This class handles assigning tables to incoming guests.
